message.content:
Based on the provided criteria and loan specifications, I'll rank the candidates from most to least suitable:

1. Elif Yılmaz (Rank #1)

- Google employee with stable income
- No debt collection cases

2. Valentina Kastrati (Rank #2)

- Swiss Red Cross employment
- No debt collection cases

3. Marija Ilić (Rank #3)
- High Pillar 3a balance (50,000 CHF)
- Prestigious employer (Herzog & de Meuron)
- No debt collection cases

4. Sandra Costa (Rank #4)
- Highest 2nd pillar balance (80,000 CHF)
- KPMG employment
- No debt collection cases

5. Leon Morina (Rank #5)
- Stable engineering employment
- Balanced own funds distribution
- No debt collection cases

6. Ismail Öztürk (Rank #6)
- Banking sector employment
- Solid own funds composition
- No debt collection cases

7. Rui Costa (Rank #7)
- Swiss Post employment
- Stable income
- No debt collection cases

8. Verena Schmid (Rank #8)
- Pharmacy management role
- Balanced own funds
- No debt collection cases

9. José Sanchez (Rank #9)

- Slightly lower 2nd pillar balance
- No debt collection cases

10. Marta Sanchez (Rank #10)
- IT security background
- Balanced own funds
- No debt collection cases

11. Michael Fischer (Rank #11)
- Government employment
- Slightly lower 2nd pillar balance
- No debt collection cases

12. Dejan Nikolić (Rank #12)
- Lowest Pillar 3a balance
- Private banking background
- No debt collection cases

context.systems_message:

- Own Funds: 218'000 CHF
